amendment.description: To establish the Safety net Organizations and Patient Advisory Commission.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1117 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1117 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Baucus. (consideration: CR S8681) To establish the Safety net Organizations and Patient Advisory Commission.
